group_1.textLeft: I see... I understand now.
In other words, that tasteless Yachiyo was@just a copy, and not actually her.

group_1.textRight: Correct.
I've met my own copy, too. I believe everyone@has one.

group_1.textLeft: So we've found the instigator of the attack.

group_1.textRight: We've learned a vital detail. Now we know@what caused this mess.

group_1.textLeft: We should try to join up with Yachiyo@while we search for the Witch's nest.
Do you agree?

group_1.textRight: Sounds like a good idea. I'm sure Yachan and@the others would do the same.

group_1.textLeft: Well? Have we convinced you that we're@the real ones now?

group_1.textRight: Yes, no doubt about it. You're definitely the@real Yachiyo and Momoko.

group_1.textLeft: It's good to hear we've managed to convince@you.
Whew, thank goodness for that... We've@finally found the real ones...

group_1.textRight: Your magic sure is handy, Kanagi. It would've@been nice if we met up earlier.
It's not so easy to see when they resist.

group_1.textLeft: Only Tsuruno and Mel left now.

group_1.textRight: For crying out loud, this is exactly the same@as the last time we came...
Let's keep an eye out for them as we move@further in.

group_1.textLeft: Okay, stick together, everyone...
That voice... Is it Mel?!

group_1.textRight: Is she being attacked?!

group_1.textLeft: Let's go!

group_1.textRight: Right!
You're more stubborn than I thought... [chara:100300:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100300:cheek_0][chara:100300:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json:motion_201][chara:100300:lipSynch_1]Hurry@up and die already!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2]Tsuruno, please stop! What's wrong with you!

group_1.textRight: Mel!

group_1.textLeft: Please help, Yachiyo! Tsuruno is acting@weird.
She's a fake! We'll help you right away!
She may look like Tsuruno, but don't let@that deter you!

group_1.textRight: It kinda feels wrong, but okay.

group_1.textLeft: (Something's not right...)

group_1.textRight: Are you okay, Mifuyu? Stand back if you can't@handle it.

group_1.textLeft: No, that's not it. It's just that something@feels off...

group_1.textRight: Off?

group_1.textLeft: Oh! Awesome! [chara:100300:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100300:cheek_1][chara:100300:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json:motion_101][chara:100300:lipSynch_1]I've got more people here whose@blood I get to see!

group_1.textRight: Mifuyu, Kanagi! Cut the chit-chat! Here@it comes!

group_1.textLeft: Damn!

group_1.textRight: And now to finish it off...

group_1.textLeft: I'll take care of it.
She may not act like her, but she still@looks exactly like one of your friends...

group_1.textRight: Thank you...
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][surround:1016A01]Take that!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashRed2][surround:1016A05][bgEffect:shakeLarge][chara:100300:effect_shake]Gwaaaaaahhh!

group_1.textRight: Mel, are you okay?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! Huh? [chara:303700:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:303700:cheek_0][chara:303700:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:303700:lipSynch_1]I can't stand...

group_1.textRight: Guess I'll have to help. Give me your hand.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you very much. Thanks for rescuing@[textRed:little ol' me].
And thanks for falling to my deception.

group_1.textRight: Why you...

group_1.textLeft: Hah! There's no escape for you now.
